meanings.definition: To cover with a new layer of pavement
meanings.sent1: They repaved the driveway to fix the cracks and holes.
meanings.sent2: The construction team repaved the sidewalk outside the school.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to repave the cake with a layer of fresh frosting.
meanings.sent4: His kind words repaved her doubts with confidence and reassurance.
meanings.sent5: The artist repaved the canvas with vibrant colors, bringing the painting to life.
